评论详情: The lesson is to believe the not good reviews posted.  I didn't and so ended up sending the "fleece" back.  By the way, this is in no way fleece.  It is light weight and feels more like a synthetic blend that sticks to your body.  All those videos must be of very, very skinny men.  I am not fat and after reading a number of reviews that said the shirt was huge, I ordered a large as I planned to wear a heavy sweater or fleece under it to do barn work.  Well it is huge, but in weird places like the length of the arms and the overall length - halfway down my thigh.  Whatever this is supposed to be, I assure you it is not.

This is my husband’s third sweater. I bought him the green and the blue one for Christmas and they fit perfect and he loves them. I said how about another sweater he said great. I like the Heather gray color and that’s what we got. He’s very happy.
Great for winter
Great fit, great comfort, have worn more than once and find very comfortable!

评论概述: Classy, soft, comfortable....runs a little big
评论详情: I love the color and quality of this shirt!  It's a great value for the money.  So far, it washes will without shrinkage or pilling.  It runs a little big, especially across the midsection, so you may want to size down.  It has a bit of stretch to it as well, so I wouldn't worry about ordering a size smaller than usual.  Although, true to size does allow for layering without issue.  Highly recommend!

This shirt is not true sized. I'm an XL but this shirt fits like it's 2 sizes bigger. Disappointed that if I return it I would get half the price for it.  I will donate instead to goodwill and not give the vendor the satisfaction of ripping off their next customer.
Exactly what I was looking for, perfect mid-layer.  I would give it 4 stars and buy one in every color if it was available in Tall size.

He loves the fabric and the shoulders fit well (XL on 5 10" 225 lbs) but the bottom hem flares out and he hates that, so it is going back.

The people claiming it’s 3 sizes too big are being dramatic.  I am 5’10 215 and fluctuate between L and XL based on the brand.  When I read the review I went with the L and it fits perfectly fine.  Order one size down and roll with it and you will be very happy.  Super comfortable and good looking sweater.
Large feels closer to an X=Large.

It runs big (if you're not sure about which size, go with the smaller one), but it's really nice. It looks like a sweater on the outside, but is fuzzy on the inside like a sweatshirt. It's cozy, warm, and looks great.

I bought this shirt for my husband. He’s a husky man-broad shoulders, long torso- kind of an upside down triangle. I normally buy him 2x and this was super, super wide almost like a parachute. We returned it.
I purchased this sweater for my son's Christmas present.  He loves the color and the material.  It fits him very well, as he has long arms.  I highly recommend this product.

Gave this to my Husband, he has worn it and says it's very warm and comfortable. Has held up in washing and wearing. I would recommend it.

For the price you can’t beat it.  Good zipper, correct sizing, good seems, and good material.  Has all the same qualities and in some cases better than some of the top name brands.  Recently I purchased a top brand and the zipper broke.  Company said to bad it’s been over 30 days.  So I purchased a second pullover from the same company.  Within 2 months the zipper broke again.  Again, Their response was too bad so sad.  Spend almost $100 on each.  I could have purchased 6 of these pullovers from Wrangler for the same price I wasted on the other two name brand.  The other company used to put out good kit.  Glad I took the chance on The wrangler fleece.  It’s a great deal and well made.
